meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Sarah Hayden Williams Erik Greb Keith Whitener Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6464.

td.p: Sarah Hayden Williams, a bakery owner and caterer from North Creek, New York
Erik Greb, a medical magazine editor from Somerset, New Jersey
Keith Whitener, a research chemist originally from Charlotte, North Carolina (whose 1-day cash winnings total $25,000)

tr.td: THE 5 SENSES
HEARING
SMELL
TASTE
SITE
TOUCHÉ

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'the olfactory system

Keith
')

tr.td: Though it sounds like an aged building for assembling goods, this system is just the sense of smell

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: And that country is one of the world\'s largest.)
...
[After Sarah\'s response is revealed]
(Alex: No, sorry. You picked the country, but we were going for the language. So you had the right country but the wrong response.)
SarahWhat is Brazil?
$799
ErikWhat is Portuguese
$4,400
KeithWhat is Portuguese?
$8,000
Portuguese')

Keith
Erik
Sarah

3rd place: $1,000

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
